heading: Thursday Night
text: Gradually increasing clouds. Lows from zero to 10 below, northeastern cold spots around 15 below. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: around 5 mph east of the Greens, 5 to 10 mph in the west, and gusting to 20 mph late in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Sun filtering through high clouds; clouds thickening west of the Greens in the afternoon, with the chance of a late-day snow shower in the St. Lawrence Valley. Highs mainly in the mid to upper 20s. Winds becoming south
text: around 5 mph east of the Greens, 5 to 10 mph in the west, and gusting to 20 mph late in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Friday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Periods snow; with a trace to an  inch east of the Greens, and a trace to 2 inches along and west of the Greens, and up to 3 inches in the St. Lawrence Valley. Lows in the mid to upper teens near and south of Route 4, and 5 to 15 above in areas north of Route 4, except 5 above to 5 below in far northern New York. Winds from the south to southeast at 5 to 10 mph, becoming northwest late in far northern New York.
